tokens.text: validates blocks catalog files in resource packs

title: Blocks Catalog
description: Validates blocks.json catalog files in resource packs. Checks for unused block resource identifiers and vanilla overrides. Can remove unused block resource identifiers.

fields.title: Block Resource Identifier
fields.description: Aggregates information about block resource identifiers defined in the blocks catalog.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the block identifier string.

fields.title: Unused Block Resource
fields.description: A block resource identifier is defined in blocks.json but not referenced by any block in the project. Consider removing it to reduce file size.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the unused block identifier string.

fields.title: Block Catalog Found
fields.description: A blocks catalog resource file (blocks.json) was found in the resource pack.

fields.title: Vanilla Override Block
fields.description: A block resource identifier overrides a vanilla Minecraft block, which is not recommended as it may cause unexpected behavior.
fields.technicalDescription: Data field contains the block identifier that overrides a vanilla block.
